item.title: Amy add a quote by Michael Cunningham
item.description: "What he remembers with perfect clarity is sitting on a train headed for Madrid, feeling the sort of happiness he imagines spirits might feel, freed of their earthly bodies but still possessed of their essential selves." -- Michael Cunningham

item.title: Amy add a quote by Michael Cunningham
item.description: "That is what we do. That is what people do. They stay alive for each other." -- Michael Cunningham

item.title: Amy add a quote by Jessica Anya Blau
item.description: "Sometimes when Anna is talking to Louise she sees words coming out of her mouth like fistfuls of stones. But she doesn't intend to spew stones; it's simply the only way Anna knows how to takl to her mother." -- Jessica Anya Blau
